channel.title: Musings and Perusings
channel.description: Welcome! Francis here. I'm a concert-chasing, coffee-obsessed, life-loving person just trying to make cool things and revolutionize education. Always down and trying to explore, adventure and experience. Senior | Informatics 2015 | UW | UX/UI/Industrial Design | Web Development

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
I’ve finally put together enough things on GitHub to host a site and use Jekyll.

In an attempt to cater to the writer in me, I’m going to attempt to update this every so often. Drop by when I’ve updated it quite a bit more!

Francis
